display_name: Filtered: Overall Non-Supine RDI at 5% desat
description: Non-Supine RDI at 5% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 5% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hrop5 +   hnrop5 + carop5 + canop5 + oarop5 + oanop5 + marop5 + manrop5)/(remepop+nremepop)
